name: Citizen
desc: An ordinary commoner.

name: Lieutenant
desc: The princess of Renais. A sword fighter on an important mission.

name: Myrmidon
desc: Swordfighters with superior speed and skill.

name: Blade Dancer
desc: Swordfighters with superior speed and skill.

name: Mercenary
desc:
Well-balanced professional soldiers for hire.
Race: Chiylo

name: Brave
desc:
Seasoned veterans with remarkable skill.
Race: Chiylo

name: Shinobi
desc: Expert in stealth and subterfuge. Possess weak attacks but many other skills.

name: Cavalier
desc:
Mounted knights with swift movement.
Race: Lykon, Mount: Horse

name: Paladin
desc:
Holy knights who fight for kingdom
and church alike.
Race: Lykon, Mount: Horse

name: Wolf Knight
desc:
Knights of Masa trained to fight
while riding vicious wolves.
Race: Lykon, Mount: Wolf

name: Guard
desc: Heavily armored knights with poor movement.

name: Vanguard
desc: Veteran horse knights.

name: Fighter
desc:
Ruffians with great strength but
poor defense.

name: Warrior
desc: Determined fighters who relish battle.

name: Pirate
desc: Untrained but fanatical combatant.

name: Barbarian
desc: Ruffians with a strong offense but poor defense.

name: Berserker
desc: Devotees of the axe. Relentless savages that deliver devastating stikes.

name: Scout
desc: Lightly armored soldiers armed with bows. Can attack from a distance.

name: Sniper
desc: Devotees of the bow. Possess incredible range.

name: Ranger
desc: Devotees of the bow. Possess incredible range.

name: Monk
desc: Kind-hearted healers.

name: Cleric
desc: Members of the clergy who wield sacred staves to aid allies.

name: Prior
desc: Mages gifted with visions of the future.

name: Saint
desc: Kind-hearted healers.

name: Apprentice
desc: Curious practioners of anima magic.

name: Sage
desc: Advanced wielders of the natural magics.

name: Scholar
desc: Impulsive mages with a tenous grasp on their magic.

name: Tactician
desc: Kind-hearted healers.

name: WindRider
desc: Knights who soar through the skies.

name: Falcon Knight
desc: Veteran pegasus knights.

name: Revenant
desc:
Walking corpses that move slowly
but attack with sharp claws.

name: Entombed
desc:
Reanimated corpses. They're not fast,
but their talons rend flesh with ease.

name: Bonewalker
desc: A summoned phantom.

name: Wight
desc: A summoned phantom.

name: Mogall
desc:
Perilous floating orbs filled with
blighting dark magic.

name: Arch Mogall
desc: A summoned phantom.

name: Recruit
desc: Mounted knights with superior movement.

name: Journeyman
desc: Young fighters with high expectations.

name: Soldier
desc:
Average soldiers possessing
no special abilities.
